featured.text: They have also rung in times of 28 and of mourning, announcing such events as royal weddings and coronations of kings, as well as funerals of heads of state.

definition.zh_def: 哀悼，對某人或某事的失去感到悲傷和懷念。
definition.en_def: The expression of deep sorrow for someone who has died or for a loss.
definition.example: She was in mourning for her late grandmother.
